targets.query:
from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Component Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "component")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Component Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "volumePowder")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Component Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weightPowder")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Component Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lengthFiber")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Component Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "thicknessLayer")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Process Monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "machineState")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Process Monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "process")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Process Monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "currentLayer")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Process Monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalLayers")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Process Monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "process")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tempBuilding" or r["_field"] == "tempFaser" or r["_field"] == "tempNozzle" or r["_field"] == "tempSurface")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Energy")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Energy Emissions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "emissionMotorReservoir" or r["_field"] == "emissionMotorNozzleY" or r["_field"] == "emissionMotorNozzleX" or r["_field"] == "emissionMotorFiber" or r["_field"] == "emissionHeatingMat1" or r["_field"] == "emissionHeatingMat2" or r["_field"] == "emissionHeatingMatFiber" or r["_field"] == "emissionHeatingNozzle" or r["_field"] == "emissionInfrared" or r["_field"] == "emissionLaser" or r["_field"] == "emissionMotorBuild" or r["_field"] == "emissionMotorDoctor")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Material Emission")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "emissionPowder")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Material Emission")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "emissionFiber")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Energy Emissions" or r["_measurement"] == "Material Emission")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "emissionEnergy" or r["_field"] == "emissionTotal" or r["_field"] == "emissionMaterial")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Energy" or r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energyTotal" or r["_field"] == "tempBuilding" or r["_field"] == "tempFaser" or r["_field"] == "tempNozzle" or r["_field"] == "tempSurface")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SLS_Data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power" or r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
